item.title: By: Carl Mullan
item.dc:creator: Carl Mullan
item.description: Great article, all good point. However, having been in the business for two decades, I prefer any EOS token or one backed by physical gold.
item.content:encoded: Great article, all good point. However, having been in the business for two decades, I prefer any EOS token or one backed by physical gold.
